Package com.wolfe.textanalyzerfx

Class TextAnalyzerFX

java.lang.Object
com.wolfe.textanalyzerfx.TextAnalyzerFX
public class TextAnalyzerFX extends Object
Contains the logic for parsing a text file to ultimately determine the top 20 most frequently occurring words in the text file.

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ArrayList<com.wolfe.textanalyzerfx.Words>
    createWordObjects(Map<String,Integer> wordList)
    Creates Words objects from provided Map and returns an ArrayList of the objects.
    static HashMap<String,Integer>
    parseText()
    Parses through a text file to remove and format the following: Remove all HTML tags Remove punctuation marks, including em-dashes and curly quotes Sets all letters to lowercase Splits all words at the space character Removes all singleton lines Parsed words are then added to a HashMap, incrementing their occurrence as they are added.
    static Map<String,Integer>
    sortWords(HashMap<String,Integer> wordCount)
    Sorts the provided words by value and limits the returned amount by the specified limit.

  • Constructor Details

    • TextAnalyzerFX

      public TextAnalyzerFX()

  • Method Details

    • parseText

      public static HashMap<String,Integer> parseText() throws FileNotFoundException
      Parses through a text file to remove and format the following:
      • Remove all HTML tags
      • Remove punctuation marks, including em-dashes and curly quotes
      • Sets all letters to lowercase
      • Splits all words at the space character
      • Removes all singleton lines
      Parsed words are then added to a HashMap, incrementing their occurrence as they are added.
      Returns:
      wordObjects HashMap<String, Integer>
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - if file is missing

    • createWordObjects

      public static ArrayList<com.wolfe.textanalyzerfx.Words> createWordObjects(Map<String,Integer> wordList)
      Creates Words objects from provided Map and returns an ArrayList of the objects.
      Parameters:
      wordList - Map<String, Integer>
      Returns:
      wordObjects ArrayList of type Words

    • sortWords

      public static Map<String,Integer> sortWords(HashMap<String,Integer> wordCount)
      Sorts the provided words by value and limits the returned amount by the specified limit.
      Parameters:
      wordCount - <String, Integer>
      Returns:
      sorted HashMap
